ing: 1 (12 ounce) package silken soft tofu, drained
1 cup white sugar, or to taste
des: "You can substitute other flavorings for the green tea. Suitable for vegans too! I approximated the amount of the green tea, but feel free to modify to taste. If you use sweetened soy milk, I suggest cutting back on the sugar."
ins:
Blend tofu in a blender or food processor until smooth; add soy milk, sugar, green tea powder, and canola oil and blend until combined.
Pour mixture into bowl of ice cream maker; freeze according to manufacturers directions.
